description:
Itou Shin`ya is the Officer in charge of the Yamato`s security section (Master-at-arms). He holds the rank of Lieutenant Junior Grade (or Second-grade Space Lieutenant). He is a native of Shiga Prefecture.
He came from the Information Bureau, and now manages Yamato`s internal security and police affairs. Always smiles politely when dealing with others, but has a condescending atmosphere
name: Itou Shin`ya
